attributes.comment:
I am writing in regard to the proposed increase in fees in processing the I-600. The
fee seems quite high already. Personally, the process of adoption is stretching
me financially to my limit. Any additional increases in the process would likely
have made the costs too prohibitive. Also, since there is not a renewal available
and approval is only good for 18 months, many adoptive parents pay two fees for
no additional services. Please consider leaving the adoption fees as they currently
stand.

Thank you for your consideration,
A Concerned Waiting Adoptive Parent
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angie McDonald
